## Color4.Lerp() method

Creates a new Color4 object set with the linearly interpolated values of "amount" between the left Color4 object and the right Color4 object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Lerp(left: Color4, right: Color4, amount: number): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | <code>Color4</code> | defines the start value |
|  right | <code>Color4</code> | defines the end value |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | defines the gradient factor |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

a new Color4 object
